The 4-card puzzle ANN evolver software, which we have
sometimes discussed here, is now available for free
download from the URL below.

This software creates an ANN that makes use of memory
to solve a puzzle.  This is done without changing the
weights nor thresholds.  The memory is in the state
vector of this highly recurrent ANN.  The weights and
thresholds are established by neuroevolution.  NEAT is
not used.  The software is in C; it is extensively documented.

=====
Mitchell Timin
http://annevolve.sourceforge.net
